page.title: 06Interview- our Policeman
page.content: Timothy and I interviewed P.C.Rampley our first question was"How long have you been with the force?"I have been with the the force for 18 years.I first worked in Ballam south London,it was alot different compared to Bloxham. Around Bloxham I tackle any crime from murder to lost children,damage is the most common crime.I use the general purpose patrol car-the panda.I would like a Police Station in Bloxham but if we have one all the other villages would want one.There is an accident blackspot outside the Warriner and that is the only one locally.Our uniform could be more practical than it is. Crime willrise in the future in the way population rises.In Bloxham there are a few people who take drugs or glue sniff because they think it gives them buzz.
